thesis.description: k-Casein which was electrophoretically (Starch gel) homogeneous was hydrolyzed with the enzyme Pronase P and the resultant hydrolyzate was fractionated by column chromatography. A fraction, rich in carbohydrate, was isolated by use of Sephadex G-25. Analysis showed that it contained at least nine different components. Another fraction was isolated by use of Sephadex G-50. Chromatographic, electrophoretic and ultracentrifugal analysis indicated that this fraction contained a single glycopeptide. The glycopeptide contained galactosamine (25.1%), galactose (22.1%) and sialic acid (16.6%), it has no N-term1nal amino acid and has serine as the C-terminal amino acid. Calculation based on the numbers of amino acid residues showed that the molecular weight of the glycopeptide was 11,300. [...]

thesis.subject: Agricultural Chemistry.
Casein
thesis.title: The carbohydrate content of kappa casein.

thesis.description: Climatology tries to codense the many aspects of the weather during a long period into a few significant figures. The first approach is usually the calculation of mean and extreme values for a particular element over a specified period. [...]

thesis.description: This study describes several methods used to analyse a changing computer system. The effects of these changes on the operating system and the overall Computing Centre are demonstrated. The results of this analysis have led to some short term improvements and also some projections of future computing power required to cope with an expanding demand in a University environment.

thesis.subject: Statistics.
Computer Science.
thesis.title: Statistical analysis of computer systems.

thesis.description: This statement helps explain what I personally experience after having travelled half way across the world and stayed in Canada for almost two years. Accordingly, this work is an attempt to look back into the educational systems in the different territories of my homeland, Malaysia, and to examine them from a broader perspective and in terms of other systems. [...]

thesis.description: Le nom d'André Dhôtel fit du bruit pour la première fois lorsque, en 1955, il remporta le Prix Femina pour son roman 'Le pays où l'on n'arrive jamais'. Qaoiqu'il ait déjà publié à cette époque une douzaine de romans, entre autres 'David' qui lui valut le Prix Sainte-Beuve en 1948, sa réputation comme romancier n'était encore guère établie auprès du grand public. [...]

thesis.description: The trade of a country is concentrated when the range of commodities which it exchanges or the range of markets within which it conducts its exchanges is very limited. In any study of the structure of a country's trade, it is relevant to know whether that trade is concentrated in either or both ways. [...]
